resources.string:
Hi, my name is Al. 

I love pork. 

The kind of eats dirty food and its own shit. 

Fun fact is that I look like a pork, a cute one of course. 

Aside from pork I love chicken and beef. Steak in medium rare. 

I go to Instagram sometimes and enjoy watching chiefs cook different kinds of meat. 

My ultimate dream is to be able to try A5+ Wagyu Steak 

I love fitness too but I love food more. 

Food is love and I can never blame it for keep me out of weight because food is equal to happiness.
